resources.string: Secretly the app that provide Privacy assurance .Concern about the privacy try our app for Therapy.The best spaces to safeguard confidential image. This provides end to end encryption to share the images.Simple UI With easy To Use Features.No Database Accuured no internet required. At secretly your images are being converted to code to make transmission process more secure. At Reciver side you view the image by entering the received code. A simple UI that makes the application more user friendly and easy to use. Your Confidential Images Are shared without being Uploaded on any serverThis app provides you high encryption also the delay times is very minimum. With this app piracy is not possible to your privacy. Secretly the app that provide Privacy assurance .The best spaces to safeguard confidential image. No Database Accquired no internet required.Concern about the privacy try our app for Therapy.
Step 1.Click on the Drop here on the screen. Step 2.Select the image from the device. Step 3.Now click the convert button to get the code. Step 4.Copy it and send code through any Media.
To switch from image to text page click on the Bidirectional Arrows to switch the mode. Also to switch from text to image page click on the Bidirectional Arrows.
Step 1.Click on the add text area on the screen. Step 2.Now Enter/Paste the code you have. Step 3.Now Click The ViewIt Button To view . Step 4.The Image appears just below the viewIt Section.
